title: Understanding of Love
overview: Adapted from the novel "Sarangui Ihae" (사랑의 이해) by Lee Hyuk Jin (이혁진).A work depicting the romance of Ha Sang-soo, Ahn Soo-yeong, Park Mi-kyeong, and Jeong Jong-hyeon, who are dating in-house, against the backdrop of Nara Bank Yeongpo branch, which marks the 99th anniversary of its foundation.
